task.summary:
Added a simulation.kt file. This contains a load of refactoring to make it so that simulations run in there own resolution but can be rendered in an arbitrary resolution through the getShapes API.
Some tweaks to the ANN configuration some refactoring of the ANN and some bug fixing.
Refactoring of genetics.kt
A load of refactoring and bug fixes for the GUI controller.

Fixed a load of threading issues.
Implemented bullets.
Implemented danger quadrants for network input.
Made asteroids break into smaller chunks when hit by bullets.
Made it so that when all sims finish, either by ship dying or all asteroids being destroyed, the genetic algorithm is carried out and the new weights are applied to the networks.

Made collision pixel perfect.
Fixed bugs in genetics (calling wrong random function).
Made it so that you can dynamically configure the amount of asteroids that a network will consider - the network calculates it's input size and hidden neuron count statically based on the ASTEROIDS_TO_CONSIDER constant in Simulation.kt.
Added vector input for the network. Rather than using quadrants which didn't give enough to learn from. Network input is now N vectors to the nearest N asteroids. Currently the vector is not calculated with the "wrap around" property of the asteroids game. So an asteriod may be on the top of the screen and the ship at the bottom - the true distance between them is small but the algorithm currently thinks it on the other side of the screen.
Worked a lot on the fitness function - A networks fitness is now a function of the ratio of asteroids destroyed multiplied by the factor of time it took to do so. I.e. otpimizing for most asteriods destroyed in least amount of time.

Added elitism to the genetics.
Made debugging toggle-able through the UI.
Normalized network input.

Added ship vector as input to network.
Made genetics make 2 children per loop where child A takes left crossover with mum and child B takes left crossover with dad.
Got rid of bias - it's useless for this problem I think.

Debug text added.
Ship direction vector and velocity vector added as input to network.

Added a simulation.kt file. This contains a load of refactoring to make it so that simulations run in there own resolution but can be rendered in an arbitrary resolution through the getShapes API.
Some tweaks to the ANN configuration some refactoring of the ANN and some bug fixing.
Refactoring of genetics.kt
A load of refactoring and bug fixes for the GUI controller.

Fixed a load of threading issues.
Implemented bullets.
Implemented danger quadrants for network input.
Made asteroids break into smaller chunks when hit by bullets.
Made it so that when all sims finish, either by ship dying or all asteroids being destroyed, the genetic algorithm is carried out and the new weights are applied to the networks.

Made collision pixel perfect.
Fixed bugs in genetics (calling wrong random function).
Made it so that you can dynamically configure the amount of asteroids that a network will consider - the network calculates it's input size and hidden neuron count statically based on the ASTEROIDS_TO_CONSIDER constant in Simulation.kt.
Added vector input for the network. Rather than using quadrants which didn't give enough to learn from. Network input is now N vectors to the nearest N asteroids. Currently the vector is not calculated with the "wrap around" property of the asteroids game. So an asteriod may be on the top of the screen and the ship at the bottom - the true distance between them is small but the algorithm currently thinks it on the other side of the screen.
Worked a lot on the fitness function - A networks fitness is now a function of the ratio of asteroids destroyed multiplied by the factor of time it took to do so. I.e. otpimizing for most asteriods destroyed in least amount of time.

Added elitism to the genetics.
Made debugging toggle-able through the UI.
Normalized network input.

Added ship vector as input to network.
Made genetics make 2 children per loop where child A takes left crossover with mum and child B takes left crossover with dad.
Got rid of bias - it's useless for this problem I think.

Debug text added.
Ship direction vector and velocity vector added as input to network.
